item.title: Curriculum Vitae
item.description: Download full CV Shane Mulligan (BSc) Blogs Practical macros in racket and how to work with them CodeLingo vs linters Combined glossary of A-Z Personal blog (You are already here) TakaheAI - AI for the enablement of humanity (deactivated) semiosis - Signs, Natural Language and Coding infogetics - Information Energetics Areas of expertise Linux Automation (CLI and cloud) Natural Language Processing Prompt Engineering Domain-Specific Languages Language-agnostic programming Information Retrieval What type of job suits me Working with many file types Working within many contexts Creating tooling to assist other developers Distilling knowledge Job Applications Application to Canva for Senior Search Infrastructure Software Engineer Application to Fortescue Metals Group for Senior Software Tester Generic Application for DevOps Engineer Past CVs This is here to communicate my background but not my direction.

item.title: Reading 23.12.19
item.description: AI NLP Language Engineering; Harnessing the Power of Language Google AI Blog: ALBERT: A Lite BERT for Self-Supervised Learning of Language Representations Computer Vision ObjectNet Automated testing Cucumber | Tools & techniques that elevate teams to greatness Writing Features - Gherkin Language - Behat 2.5.3 documentation Information Retrieval Why databases use ordered indexes but programming uses hash tables (evanjones.ca) Programming languages haskell parsers An introduction to parsing text in Haskell with Parsec - Nick.
